TopicTitle: Thinking of Starting a Podcast Series

Articles.Content:
I'm thinking of doing a podcast series around Kerbal Space Program and am looking for suggestions about what people would like to see (or I guess hear) in it. I was thinking of doing mod reviews, devnotes overviews, game update information and mission reports. I was also hoping to maybe do some interviews (or co-casts) with streamers or other people from the community (popular mod developers maybe?). I would be putting episodes out on hopefully a weekly basis.

If this is something people would like and I would be more than happy do work on this. I know there already is one but there is always room for more (because you can never have enough KSP).

Also I am aware that this is not a stream, but I would probably end up hosting this at my stream as well which can be found at http://www.twitch.tv/atpistolz4pandaz/.

For the curious I made a pilot this evening for fun. https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B3iR9Sc6WQv9TWJyVFozRmN5azQ/view

Edited December 4, 2014 by pistolz4pandaz
Added pilot and link
